Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class Wordle

      class Wordle extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • answerWord
          String answerWord
          the answer of the word randomly selected a word from wordList
        • buttons
          JButton[] buttons
          An array of JButton elements representing the keyboard buttons in the game.
        • chances
          int chances
          int to keep track of the amount of guesses the user has used. once it hits 6 and they haven't gotten the word the game is over and it displays the word
        • chanceWords
          String[] chanceWords
          array of words to keep track of what words that the user has entered used for the word visual at the top where it displays the words
        • colorArray
          int[] colorArray
          Array (length 5) either has a: normal Gray - 0 darker gray - 1 yellow - 2 green - 3 depending on what it is assigned
        • colors
          Color[] colors
          array of colors for the backgrounds (new color(r,g,b))
        • container
          Container container
          The container that holds all the UI components for the game (e.g., buttons, labels).
        • gridLayout
          GridLayout gridLayout
          The grid layout used for organizing the buttons in the first grid on the UI.
        • letters
          String[] letters
          array of letters for the keyboard (in qwerty order) includes "->" for enter at i = 19 and "<-" at i = length-1
        • textArea1
          JTextArea textArea1
          This is the text area right above the keyboard where the user can see what they are typing
        • wordList
          String[] wordList
          List of 20 words that answerWord randomly selects from final because the list should never change
